content: The read along text is tiny. I wish the story text font size could be increased. Along with that, tapping on individual words to hear it pronounced would be awesome and helpful for little readers practicing on their own.
This us the worst app ever, big waste of money, been trying for three days to open it, just like throwing money in the trash.
New update makes it work again. Love the new stories and hope more arrive soon! Our little one asks for this stories on the go and love it's more of a interactive storybook and not just a video.
replyContent: Thank you for your patience as we made the update. We're so pleased that the app is working for you and your little one!

content: When I first downloaded the app, it wouldn't even open. Then, after a couple days, the app just started working. I didn't see an update come through, and I don't know what changed. Now that it is working, my daughter loves it. She enjoys the stories and the little games, and I'm happy knowing that she's getting quality educational content instead of mindless entertainment.
replyContent: We greatly appreciate you taking the time to update us on your experience with the app. A new version of the Daniel Tiger's Storybooks app went live yesterday with some fixes. Please feel free to contact us at AndroidApps@pbs.org if you need assistance in the future. Thanks for updating your review and for your support of PBS KIDS!
